name: eSignal
tag_list: trading-software, trading-platform, online-trading-platform, online-trading-software, stock-market-software, charting-software
overview:
eSignal, an Interactive Data company, offers its eSignal suite of products and services, as well as trading education, global real-time market data and decision support tools to active traders worldwide. eSignal provides streaming data from financial markets and allows users to examine the data using fundamental and technical analysis.

The award-winning trading software for serious traders and investors, eSignal, offers charting tools, streaming stock market quotes, as well as futures, options, Forex and ETFs, portfolio back testing and direct access to a choice of brokers, including real-time market data, news and analytics – all from a single, customizable trading platform.

Other products include eSignal, Advanced GET Edition, eSignal OnDemand, as well as a browser-based version - LiveCharts - and a mobile version, QuoTrek - for use on mobile devices and smart phones.

Join the eSignal Learning team online for free seminars that teach you the secrets of successful trading - Learn How to Trade, What to Trade & When to Trade.
